word: You say that some connected with the school object to the use of "Healthful Living," and state that I disapprove of the book. In answer to this statement I would say that I have always appreciated "Healthful Living." In no instance have I uttered a word of disapproval, neither has a thought of disapproval entered my mind. "Healthful Living" is a good and useful book, and can be used in your school with good results.
